amendment.description: Amendment provides funding for the Census Bureau of $2.5 million in order to plan for the inclusion of Americans abroad in the 2010 census.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for the Census Bureau by $2.5 million in order to plan for the inclusion of Americans abroad in the 2010 census.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney (NY) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
